test 1 - set atime and mtime to 4/20
atime: 2018-04-20 11:11:11.123456789 +0000
mtime: 2018-04-20 11:11:11.123456789 +0000

test 2 - increment mtime by 1s and 1ns
atime: 2018-04-20 11:11:11.123456789 +0000
mtime: 2018-04-20 11:11:12.123456790 +0000

test 3 - increment atime by 2s and 2ns
atime: 2018-04-20 11:11:13.123456791 +0000
mtime: 2018-04-20 11:11:12.123456790 +0000
